**Responsibilities:**



**Responsibilities:**

In the highly competitive race of drug discovery, Lilly's research informatics team has combined novel techniques, simulation, analytics, and other in-silico capabilities with deep knowledge of science to discover effective and differentiated therapies in cancer, diabetes, immunology, neurodegenerative and other disease areas. This position will play a key role in the advancement of Lilly's informatics capabilities and in the discovery of novel disease targets, biomarkers and therapies.



**Key Objectives/Deliverables:**



+ Drive the discovery of novel disease targets, biomarkers and/or therapies by leveraging world-class informatics skills.

+ Develop proof-of-concept methods/workflows in an HPC/Cloud environment.

+ Participate as a technical/scientific lead on cross-functional research teams with members from Lilly discovery research, patient tailoring, IT and statistics.

+ Influence and shape the informatics capabilities strategy by providing regular input to projects, specialized databases, innovative computational methods, and advances in research.

+ Drive the evaluation of external and internal informatics platforms/services/data sources with focus on capabilities, workflows and visualizations.



**Req ID:**



42390BR



**Additional Skills/Preferences:**



+ Postdoctoral training or work experience in drug discovery research with focus on computational methods, tools and databases

+ Experience in applying computational systems biology, integrative analysis and high dimensional data visualization approaches to facilitate interpretation and hypothesis generation, preferably in a cross-therapeutic setting.

+ Understanding of software development in research and production environments. Familiarity with writing queries (SQL) and working with databases. Ability to take someone else's code (in any language) and make changes.

+ Experience with Amazon S3 and EC2 or Google cloud technologies as well as with raw data management and archiving.

+ Ability to work with minimal supervision, Innovative thinking with strong problem-solving skills, Excellent communicator with ability to communicate complex technical issues to diverse audiences.

+ Demonstrable experience in processing, organizing, analyzing and visualizing complex data and information from disparate sources.

+ Expertise in one or more of text and data mining, data analytics including machine learning.

+ Programming skills in languages such as R, Python, C/C++ etc. and related informatics packages and tools.

+ Working knowledge of Cloud and HPC environments. Experience with high performance cluster computing queuing systems such as SGE. Experience with Spotfire, .NET, NoSQL, pipelining tools (KNIME, Galaxy), computer networking, and HPC batch scheduler.



**Additional Information:**
